price: Lẹ́yìn náà, kò níí kú sínú rẹ̀, kò sì níí ṣẹ̀mí (àlàáfíà).
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
